short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Bunny & Rabbit wallpaper turn new tab to HD custom Bunny & Rabbit background. Cute Bunny & Rabbit theme for animal fan.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Conill Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Conill.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Králičí mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Králičí HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Králičí.
short.da: Kanin Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Kanin tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Kanin fans.
short.de: Kaninchen Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Kaninchen Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Κουνέλι αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Κουνέλι.
short.es: La extensión Coneja cambia la nueva pestaña con el fondo Coneja wallpaper HD.
short.fi: Kani laajennus muuttaa uuden välilehden sivun Kani-taustakuvan HD-taustalla. Teemat Kani faneille.
short.fr: L'extension Lapine change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Lapine. Thèmes pour les fans de Lapine.
short.it: L'estensione Coniglia cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Coniglia. Temi per i fan di Coniglia.
short.ja: ウサギの壁紙拡張機能は、ウサギの壁紙HDの背景を持つ新しいタブページを変更します。ウサギファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 토끼 배경 화면 확장은 토끼 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 토끼 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Królik zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Królik HD. Motywy dla fanów Królik.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Coelha muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Coelha.
short.sv: Kanin förlängning ändra ny flik med Kanin tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Kanin fans.
short.tr: Tavşan uzantısı, Tavşan duvar kağıdı HD arka planıyla yeni sekme sayfasını değiştirir. Tavşan hayranları için temalar.
short.zh_CN: 兔子壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为兔子的背景壁纸。兔子粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 兔子壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為兔子的背景壁紙。兔子粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Bunny & Rabbit wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Bunny & Rabbit background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Bunny & Rabbit new tab.
